stack writes:
> Mind if I change the line lengths to < 80, put an LGPL license on it 
> with you as author and check it in to HEAD?

Be my guest. You'll have to fix the line lengths on
URIRegExpFilter.java too, since virtually all of this is cribbed from
there. ;-)

One suggestion for the Developer's Guide: while the section on filters
is thin with the proviso that the architecture will change, it may
still be worth noting the need to add the class to the modules
configuration file.

But no, I don't mind. It's yours to do what you want with.

    -tree
